name: Mark Breeze
description: '''Mark Breeze''' (real name '''Mark Brady''', born 1970), also known as '''DJ Breeze''', is a British DJ and producer of [[UK hardcore]] music. He is best known for his collaborations with [[Darren Styles]] as '''Styles & Breeze''' and the compilation mix series [[Clubland X-Treme Hardcore]]. He is also the founder of the label Infinity Recordings, running it from 1997 to 2003, when DJ Silver took over its operations.
